0.Major_Activities1:
I.	To preserve and promote cultural and traditional costumes of  ladakh.
II.	To establish and promote philosophical systems , meditation method of doctrinal an essential teaching of Buddhist as propounded under the Drukpa Kargyud school of Tibetan Buddhism. 
III.	To organize teaching, symposium , seminars camps and to open and run centers interested in promotion the objectives of the Society.
IV.	To establish develop, maintain and mange institution towards the pursuit  of the afore said objectiv
